mapper.insert: insert into guideboard (boardcontent, boardtitle, boardid, boardtype, boardview, boardgood) values (#{gvo.boardcontent}, #{gvo.boardtitle}, #{gvo.boardid}, ${gvo.boardtype}, ${gvo.boardview}, ${gvo.boardgood})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as st, A.* from (select * from guideboard order by boardsid desc) A where rownum <= #{end}) where st >= #{start}
select * from (select rownum as st, A.* from (select * from guideboard where BOARDTYPE = 0 order by boardsid desc) A where rownum <= #{end}) where st >= #{start}
select * from (select rownum as st, A.* from (select * from guideboard where BOARDTYPE = 1 order by boardsid desc) A where rownum <= #{end}) where st >= #{start}
select * from (select rownum as st, A.* from (select * from guideboard where BOARDTYPE = 2 order by boardsid desc) A where rownum <= #{end}) where st >= #{start}
select count(*) from guideboard where boardtype = 0
select count(*) from guideboard where boardtype = 1
select count(*) from guideboard where boardtype = 2
